meanings.definition: Vibrating or oscillating with a steady rhythm.
meanings.sent1: The pulsating engine of the car hummed as it idled.
meanings.sent2: The pulsating waves gently rocked the boat back and forth.
meanings.sent3: The pulsating phone on the table seemed to dance to its own tune.
meanings.sent4: The pulsating glow of the fireflies lit up the night sky like tiny lanterns.
meanings.sent5: The pulsating light from the lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.
